bwwExcerpt: : Under the direction of Alex Timbers, a veteran of movie-to-stage musicals like "Rocky" and "Beetlejuice," "Moulin Rouge!" re-creates that pre-show pandemonium only twice during the show itself and once again at the curtain call.
